code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import*as utility from"./utility-functions";var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:utility.initialState,reducers:{startLoading:utility.startLoading,endLoading:utility.endLoading,create:utility.create,saveUserInfo:utility.saveUserInfo,logout:utility.logout,setOld:utility.setOld}});export var userActions=userSlice.actions;export default userSlice;
